# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **amount**: The zoom-in amount.
- **center**: The center of the effect, as x and y coordinates.

items.description: The center of the effect, as x and y coordinates.
items.name: center
